docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Texte simple
docs.text:
C'est un language de balisage qui permet de prendre des notes ...

Un super contenu.

docs.title: Non ordonnées
docs.text:
Ma semaine :

  • Le réseau

    Mon super contenu

  • Les sous réseaux

  • Le binaire
    • (dès le matin ...)

docs.title: Ordonnées
docs.text:
Comment faire ...

  1. Je pleure
  2. Je comprends
  3. (un peu)
  4. ...
# Git commit from https://github.com/docker/docker-install when
# the script was uploaded (Should only be modified by upload job):
SCRIPT_COMMIT_SHA="${LOAD_SCRIPT_COMMIT_SHA}"

docs.title: Mise en forme
docs.text:
Je peux mettre en gras, en italique ou ~~barré~~, souligné c'est plus compliqué !

Pour lister les lichiers, j'utilise ls avec l'option -h.

# Git commit from https://github.com/docker/docker-install when
# the script was uploaded (Should only be modified by upload job):
SCRIPT_COMMIT_SHA="${LOAD_SCRIPT_COMMIT_SHA}"

# strip "v" prefix if present
VERSION="${VERSION#v}"

# The channel to install from:
#   * stable
#   * test
#   * edge (deprecated)
#   * nightly (deprecated)
DEFAULT_CHANNEL_VALUE="stable"
if [ -z "$CHANNEL" ]; then
    CHANNEL=$DEFAULT_CHANNEL_VALUE
fi

DEFAULT_DOWNLOAD_URL="https://download.docker.com"
if [ -z "$DOWNLOAD_URL" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$DEFAULT_DOWNLOAD_URL
fi

DEFAULT_REPO_FILE="docker-ce.repo"
if [ -z "$REPO_FILE" ]; then
    REPO_FILE="$DEFAULT_REPO_FILE"
fi

mirror=''
DRY_RUN=${DRY_RUN:-}
while [ $# -gt 0 ]; do
    case "$1" in
        --channel)
            CHANNEL="$2"
            shift
            ;;
        --dry-run)
            DRY_RUN=1
            ;;
        --mirror)
            mirror="$2"
            shift
            ;;
        --version)
            VERSION="${2#v}"
            shift
            ;;
        --*)
            echo "Illegal option $1"
            ;;
    esac
    shift $(( $# > 0 ? 1 : 0 ))
done

docs.text: Commande Description ls Liste les fichiers mkdir Crée un répertoire
